build-essential
python-dev
libcurl4-openssl-dev

# Listed explicitly so they are removed correctly.
gcc
g++
gfortran

# Required for ea-utils.
libgsl-dev

# Required for building lxml python package.
libxml2-dev
libxslt1-dev

# Required for compiling R package arrayQualityMetrics.
libxt-dev
libcairo2-dev

# Required for some R packages.
liblapack-dev
libopenblas-dev
libssl-dev
